EmailTemplate.name: 18-02 BuildingEnergy Afterparty
EmailTemplate.subject: Come Hang Out at the NESEA Afterpary, Sponsored by BlueWave!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Want to talk solar into the night?
Join BlueWave at the NESEA Afterparty!
BlueWave is sponsoring the event, and we'd love to grab some drinks and talk solar with you!
BlueWave Solar is also exhibiting at the conference! Please stop by Booth 55 and say hello!
In addition, BlueWave's very own Betsy Glynn is Co-Chair of the conference and don't miss BlueWave's Mark Sylvia fielding "Lightning Round FAQs" on what it means to be a B-Corp from 3-4pm on March 9th!
Conference Details:
When: March 7-9th, 2018 Where: The Westin Boston Waterfront
More info: This event is powered by the Northeast Sustainable Energy Association (NESEA). NESEA helps high-performance building and energy efficiency professionals improve their practices by learning from and networking with each other.
To learn more about BlueWave please visit our website.
Planning on attending? Send us an email if you'd like to connect!
We hope to see you there! - All of us here at BlueWave
